mapper.insert: insert into clusters_auth (cluster_id, cluster_name, org_id, org_name, workspace_id, workspace_name) values (#{cloudAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloudAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workspaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workspaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
